frame.name: Inclination
frame.definition:
<def-root>Due to internal forces/properties, an <fen>Entity</fen> is inclined towards a particular <fen>Behavior</fen>, which may be to perform an action or to maintain a state. The underlying force is seen as being beyond the <fen>Entity</fen>'s control. The <fen>Degree</fen> to which the <fen>Entity</fen> is inclined towards the <fen>Behavior</fen> may also be specified as well as the <fen>Basis</fen> for the inclination.
<ex><fex name="Entity">My grandmother</fex> <m>has</m> <fex name="Behavior">criminal</fex> <t>tendencies</t>. </ex> <ex> "<fex name="Entity">Smithers</fex> has always <m>had</m> a deplorable <t>tendency</t> <fex name="Behavior">to exhibitionism</fex>. </ex> <ex><fex name="Entity">Chuck</fex> <m>was</m> not <fex name="Degree">very</fex> <t>inclined</t> <fex name="Behavior">to believe me</fex>. </ex> <ex> <fex name="Entity">Smithers</fex> <m>has</m> a <fex name="Basis">genetic</fex> <t>predisposition</t> <fex name="Behavior">for neural tube defects</fex>. </ex></def-root>

FE.name: Entity
FE.definition:
<def-root>TheFrame Element <fen>Entity</fen> identifies the person or thing that has a tendency towards some Behaviour.
<ex> <fex name="Entity">Lubomir</fex> was not <t>inclined</t> to believe me </ex></def-root>

FE.name: Behavior
FE.definition:
<def-root>The FE <fen>Behavior</fen> marks expressions that indicate which state or action the <fen>Entity</fen> tends towards.
<ex>Martha has a <t>tendency</t> <fex name="Behavior">to overdo the housekeeping</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Degree
FE.definition:
<def-root>This Frame Element marks expressions that indicate how great the inclination of an <fen>Entity</fen> towards a <fen>Behavior</fen> is.
<ex>We're <fex name="Degree">very</fex> <t>inclined</t> <fex name="Behavior">to doubt it</fex>. </ex></def-root>

FE.name: Basis
FE.definition:
<def-root>This FE marks expressions that indicate why the <fen>Entity</fen> has the propensity for some <fen>Behavior</fen>.
<ex>Smurphs have a <fex name="Basis">natural</fex> <t>propensity</t> to hide in caves</ex> </def-root>

FE.name: Containing_event
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE denotes an event that occurs or state of affairs that holds at a time that includes the time during which the event or state of affairs reported by the target occurs and of which it is taken to be a part.</def-root>

lexUnit.name: tendency.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: an inclination towards a particular characteristic or type of behaviour

lexUnit.name: inclined.a
lexUnit.definition: COD: have a specified tendency, disposition, or talent.

lexUnit.name: prone.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: having a tendency or inclination

lexUnit.name: predisposition.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: liable or inclined to a specified attitude, action, or condition.

lexUnit.name: penchant.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: a strong liking or inclination

lexUnit.name: sense (of humor).n
lexUnit.definition: FN: a tendency towards a (good) property (humor or timing)

lexUnit.name: of a mind.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: to think about an action with the intent of carrying out the action
